Make a tidy tree

Source: R/makeTidyTree.R
makeTidyTree.Rd

Given a distance matrix, computes a cladogram with the stats::hclust function, and returns it as a tibble::tibble formatted for the tidytree package.

Usage

makeTidyTree(distMat)

Arguments

distMat

a distance matrix

Value

A tbl_tree object

Examples

makeTidyTree((Halo_PercentDiff/2 + t(Halo_PercentDiff)/2))
#> Warning: Arguments in `...` must be used.
